languages.text: "Всякие мутации у нас нижнепалубников случаются. Мало ли, у кого что на лбу растет — главное, что душа чистая, не то, что у вас".
"All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."
languages.original_text: "Всякие мутации у нас нижнепалубников случаются. Мало ли, у кого что на лбу растет — главное, что душа чистая, не то, что у вас".

traits.locale_text: "All sorts of mutations happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads, what matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."
"All sorts of mutations happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads, what matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."
"All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

"All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

languages.text: «En las cubiertas inferiores hay toda clase de mutaciones. ¿Qué importa lo que les crezca en la frente? Lo importante es que sus almas son puras. Al contrario que la tuya».
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

traits.locale_text: «En las cubiertas inferiores hay toda clase de mutaciones. ¿Qué importa lo que les crezca en la frente? Lo importante es que sus almas son puras. Al contrario que la tuya».

languages.text: 「私たち最下層民には、あらゆる突然変異が起こりえる。彼らの額に浮き出たものなんて、誰が気にするというの？重要なのは、魂が清くあること。そして、あなたの魂はそうじゃない」
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

traits.locale_text: 「私たち最下層民には、あらゆる突然変異が起こりえる。彼らの額に浮き出たものなんて、誰が気にするというの？重要なのは、魂が清くあること。そして、あなたの魂はそうじゃない」

languages.text: “我们这些下等人可能会发生各种各样的变异。谁管他们脑门上长了什么东西？他们的灵魂是纯洁的，但你的却不是，这就足够了。”
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

traits.locale_text: “我们这些下等人可能会发生各种各样的变异。谁管他们脑门上长了什么东西？他们的灵魂是纯洁的，但你的却不是，这就足够了。”

languages.text: "Bei uns Unterdeckern können alle möglichen Mutationen auftreten. Wen schert es, was auf ihrer Stirn wächst? Wichtig ist, dass ihre Seelen rein sind. Und die Eure ist das nicht."
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

traits.locale_text: "Bei uns Unterdeckern können alle möglichen Mutationen auftreten. Wen schert es, was auf ihrer Stirn wächst? Wichtig ist, dass ihre Seelen rein sind. Und die Eure ist das nicht."

languages.text: « Le bas peuple est sujet à toutes sortes de mutations. Qu'est-ce que ça peut faire qu'il leur pousse un truc sur le front ? Tout ce qui compte, c'est la pureté de leur âme. Et la vôtre est très loin d'être pure. »
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."

traits.locale_text: « Le bas peuple est sujet à toutes sortes de mutations. Qu'est-ce que ça peut faire qu'il leur pousse un truc sur le front ? Tout ce qui compte, c'est la pureté de leur âme. Et la vôtre est très loin d'être pure. »

languages.text: "Biz alt güverte sakinleri, her çeşit mutasyonla cebelleşmişizdir. Alınlarında ne olduğu kimin umurunda? Önemli olan ruhlarının temiz olup olmadığı. Seninkiyse kirli."
languages.original_text: "All sorts of mutations can happen to us bottom-deckers. Who cares what grows on their foreheads? What matters is that their souls are pure. And yours is not."
